actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September annually as "National Good Neighbor Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September of each year as "National Good Neighbor Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Sunday in September annually as "National Good Neighbor Day".
